content.full_text: The NIH stroke scale (NIHSS) codes (R29.7--) can be used in conjunction with acute stroke codes (I60-I63) to identify the patient's neurological status and the severity of the stroke. The stroke scale codes should be sequenced after the acute stroke diagnosis code(s). At a minimum, report the initial score documented. If desired, a facility may choose to capture multiple stroke scale scores. (Evidence: pg no: 77, L54-L56)
